_header: Whoso will not afore ye yee thing on this manger
_description: Nonsense rhymes — two couplets, preceded by three Latin and followed by two Latin lines

TCD516.Transcription:
Ho so wyl not a fore ȝe ȝee thyng on thys mangerehe schall
                    at þe lat ȝere be in grett dangerehorne horne hornefor mery
                    hit ys in herbyst to repe corne
